title: Archive HL7 Application
description: DICOM Archive HL7 Application related information

hl7PatientUpdateTemplateURI.title: HL7 Patient Update Template URI
hl7PatientUpdateTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used by HL7v2 Patient Update Service.

hl7ImportReportTemplateURI.title: HL7 Import Report Template URI
hl7ImportReportTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet to transcode received HL7 ORU^R01 to DICOM SR.

hl7ScheduleProcedureTemplateURI.title: HL7 Schedule Procedure Template URI
hl7ScheduleProcedureTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet to transcode received HL7 ORM^O01, OMI^O23, OMG^O19 to DICOM MWL items.

hl7ScheduledProtocolCodeInOrder.title: HL7 Schedule Protocol Code in Order
hl7ScheduledProtocolCodeInOrder.description: Specifies location of Scheduled Protocol Code in received HL7 Order message. Enumerated values: OBR_4_1, OBR_4_4.

hl7ScheduledStationAETInOrder.title: HL7 Schedule Station AET in Order
hl7ScheduledStationAETInOrder.description: Specifies location of Scheduled Station AE Title in received HL7 Order message. Enumerated values: ORC_18. Not effective for HL7 v2.5.1 OMI^O23 with IPC segment. If absent or no value is provided in the configured field, the Scheduled Station AE Title is selected according configured rules.

hl7LogFilePattern.title: HL7 Log File Pattern
hl7LogFilePattern.description: Path to HL7 messages which will be captured exactly as received. If absent, there is no logging.

hl7ErrorLogFilePattern.title: HL7 Error Log File Pattern
hl7ErrorLogFilePattern.description: Path to HL7 messages which will be captured exactly as received, when processing of HL7 messages fails. If absent, there is no logging.

hl7OrderScheduledStation.title: Scheduled Station for HL7 Order
hl7OrderScheduledStation.description: Scheduled Station selected on MWL HL7 Order Feed

hl7OrderSPSStatus.title: SPS Status for HL7 Order
hl7OrderSPSStatus.description: Specifies SPS Status of DICOM MWL items created/updated on received HL7 ORM^O01, OMI^O23, OMG^O19 messages
